titles.title: Your Blood Has Washed Away My Sin

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 o1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
The mystr'y of the cross I cannot comprehend
The agonies of Calvary
You the perfect holy One crushed Your Son
Drank the bitter cup reserved for me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Your blood has washed away my sins
Jesus thank You
The Father's wrath completely satisfied
Jesus thank You
Once Your enemy now seated at Your table
Jesus thank You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
By Your perfect sacrifice I've been brought near
Your enemy You've made Your friend
Pouring out the riches of Your glorious grace
Your mercy and Your kindness know no end

verse.name: o1
verse.lines:
Lover of my soul I want to live for You
(4x)
